    • Constructor Detail

      • Aviary

        public Aviary(java.lang.String name,
              int surface,
              int maxAnimals,
              int height,
              int roofState)
        Constructor for the Aviary
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the aviary
        surface - The surface of the aviary
        maxAnimals - The maximum number of animals that the aviary can contain
        height - The height of the aviary
        roofState - The roof state cleanliness (0 = bad, 1 = correct, 2 = good)
